extendedInfo.description: If now you have saved lots of videos on your sd card, but have no idea of how to manage and watch them simply and conveniently.Custom Sort Video Player will be a great choice for you. FAQ:1.    What is the feature of this video player?This video player features user custom sort settings.That is to say, you can resort your video files in this video player. In details, it offers you four kinds of sorting ways: name, time, size and format. You can choose to resort your video files by name or format to assist your file search.In this way, you can find the one that you need easily after resorting, even if you have a sea of videos on your sd card. 2.  How to use this video player?>>Click Menu button, and you can see a button list.>> Click the search button to scan and search your video files on your sd card. After that, you can see a playlist in this player.>> Click Clear button to delete the playlist.>>Click menu button again, you can go back to the first page.>>Click A to Z to resort your video files directly. ##############################Warnings: Though there are notification ads or icon ads in this app, you still can run it normally.##############################
